summary.span: 实现数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）所需的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by a spin box (also known as an up-down control).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个数字调整框由一个文本框和小垂直滚动条，通常称为调节钮控件组成。A spin box consists of a text box and a small vertical scroll bar, commonly referred to as a spin button control. 类链接两个控件，并允许用户更改显示，在文本框中，通过单击向上或向下按钮或通过直接在文本框中输入相应值的类型。The class links the two controls and allows the user to change the display in the text box by clicking the up or down buttons or by entering the appropriate type of value directly into the text box. 使用数字调整框，在你想要限制的用户的值列表的情况下可以选择，类似于列表框或组合框。Use the spin box in cases where you want to limit the list of values a user can select, similar to a list box or combo box. 根据你想要显示的类型，使用一个数字调整框的优点是列表的它允许您快速将有效的值，而不是列表的添加一个项目的范围设置一次。Depending upon the type of list you want to display, the advantage to using a spin box is that it allows you to quickly set a range of valid values, rather than adding items one at a time. 因为派生类时，可以限制的数据类型实现一个数字调整框需要比文本框中，更少数据验证。Implementing a spin box requires less data validation than a text box, as you can limit the data type when you derive a class from . 这就类，该类将值限制为数值类型，并使用和属性以验证数据。An example of this is the class, which limits the values to the numeric type and uses a and property to validate the data. 若要允许用户使用箭头键更改数字显示框的内容，请设置属性设置为`true`。To allow the user to use the arrow keys to change the contents of a spin box, set the property to `true`. 若要将用户限制为指定的值，设置属性设置为`true`。To restrict the user to values you specify, set the property to `true`. 若要控制在数字显示框的文本的对齐方式，设置属性。To control the alignment of text in the spin box, set the property. 若要设置的对齐方式的向上和向下按钮相对于控件的文本框部分，设置属性设置为任一或。To set the alignment of the up and down buttons in relation to the text box portion of the control, set the property to either or . 和方法，重写时，处理单击向上或向下按钮。The and methods, when overridden, handle the clicking of the up or down buttons. 重写时，和方法验证 （不管是选择或输入） 的值并更新数字显示框中显示的文本。When overridden, the and methods validate the value (either selected or entered) and update the text displayed in the spin box. 如果值未通过验证，使用方法来选择不是有效的文本。If the value fails validation, use the method to select the text that is not valid. 这允许用户快速更正文本的通过只需键入新值而无需手动选择或删除现有的文本。This allows the user to quickly correct the text by simply typing in a new value without having to manually select or delete the existing text. 从.NET Framework 4.6，开始将基于 app.config 文件包含以下条目时系统 DPI 设置调整控件的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类，并设置它的一些属性派生自。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此代码，则需要名为控件`numericUpDown1`、 两个控件分别命名为`comboBox1`并`comboBox2`，和三个控件分别命名为`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在窗体上创建。This code requires that you have a control named `numericUpDown1`, two controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form. 添加到以下项`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 添加到以下项`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. 该代码，可在运行时更改属性值并查看每个如何影响的外观和行为的数字调整框。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`和数字显示框 （也称为 up-down 控件） 具有焦点，用户可以使用向上键和向下箭头键选择值。If the property is set to `true` and the spin box (also known as an up-down control) has focus, the user can use the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys to select values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类，并设置它的一些属性派生自。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此代码，则需要名为控件`numericUpDown1`、 两个控件分别命名为`comboBox1`并`comboBox2`，和三个控件分别命名为`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在窗体上创建。This code requires that you have a control named `numericUpDown1`, two controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form. 添加到以下项`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 添加到以下项`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. 该代码，可在运行时更改属性值并查看每个如何影响的外观和行为的数字调整框。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
